snippet: On Tuesday, a judge halted an investigation involving conservative groups and Gov. Scott Walker’s campaign committee, but on Wednesday, an appeals court stayed the decision.
abstract: Federal appeals court stays injunction from United States District Court Judge Rudolph T Randa that had halted investigation into possible campaign finance violations involving conservative groups in Wisconsin and Gov Scott Walker’s campaign committee; court also calls for a lower court review of an earlier, separate appeal in the case.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, a judge halted an investigation involving conservative groups and Gov. Scott Walker’s campaign committee, but on Wednesday, an appeals court stayed the decision.

headline.main: Conflicting Rulings Cloud Wisconsin Campaign Finance Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Conflicting Rulings Cloud Wisconsin Campaign Finance Inquiry

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
